resources.string: With this app you can view duplicate contacts, select and delete them. Duplicate contacts are identified by a unique color scheme which helps you to view the master value and its associated duplicates. All duplicates are auto-selected for deletion but you have the choice of un-selecting them in case you wish to keep some of the contacts. This app also comes with a dialer allowing you to make calls to your contacts and also has features to add new contacts and edit existing ones.
